flawed_nl_solution:
He writes 3*50=<<3*50=150>>150 pages a week
That means he writes 150*52=<<150*52=7800>>7800 pages of short stories a year
So he writes 7800+1200=<<7800+1200=90000>>90000 pages a year
So he needs 90000/2=<<90000/2=45000>>45000 sheets of paper
That means he needs 45000/500=<<45000/500=90>>90 reams of paper

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9000, not 90000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
